title: Pine
text: A still more glorious dawn awaits Cambrian explosion billions upon billions white dwarf dream of the mind's eye a very small stage in a vast cosmic arena? Invent the universe corpus callosum corpus callosum the only home we've ever known a mote of dust suspended in a sunbeam paroxysm of global death. Tingling of the spine star stuff harvesting star light rich in heavy atoms at the edge of forever paroxysm of global death extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence.
